name: Space Invasion (Dabble Games)
description:
"Space Invasion" is a game I made on 27/02/22 and it is inspired by the classic game called "Space Invaders"

Description

Destroy all 14 ships on the screen to make it to the next level. There are an infinite number of levels. Enemies can only move side to side. If you shoot and miss then your shot will be warped and will destroy part of your wall which will remain destroyed for future levels, any further misses in the same position may cause you to be hit ending the game but your shot can still hit an enemy if you are lucky!

Controls

Shoot - hold screen
